channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect in Walmart knife attack expected to face terrorism and assault charges
item.description: Authorities say they plan to file terrorism and assault with intent to murder charges against the suspect in a weekend knife attack at a Walmart store in Michigan.

item.title: Trump’s demand for Washington NFL team name change ignores years of psychological data, experts say
It’s a year of rapid change, except when it comes to Trump’s approval numbers, AP-NORC polling finds
